resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps >
No location detected. Make sure location is enabled on the device.

Common problem items and answers to corresponding questions
The flashlight of this device is damaged or there is no flashlight
You can also use screen light instead

string-array.name: faq_question
string-array.item: Why is my flashlight not working or strobing all the time?
Why can I only use the screen light?
Why is the flashlight turned off abnormally?
How to change the color of light?
Why is the speed of the battery consumed quickly and the temperature of the device high?
Why can not properly use the map?

string-array.name: faq_answer
string-array.item: The flashlight of this device is damaged or there is no flashlight. You can also use screen light instead. Steps to use screen light: Back to homepage → Click the screen light button in the lower right corner.

Unfortunately, due to the limitations of the device hardware, the color of the flash cannot be changed, only the color of the screen light can be changed. Steps to change the color of the screen light: Back to homepage → Click the screen light button In the lower right corner → The color of the light is changed by adjusting the hue (circle), saturation (first line), and brightness (second line).

If the speed of the battery consumed quickly and the temperature of the device high, make the following settings:\n- If the battery consumption is too fast, use the power control feature to protect the battery. Steps to turn on power control: Go to the settings page → Turn on Power control → Set low battery warning → OK.\n- If the temperature of the device high. You can also use screen light instead. Steps to use screen light: Back to homepage → Click the screen light button in the lower right corner.

If your compass is inaccurate, it may be due to the following reasons:\n-There is magnetic field interference near the device. Please stay away from magnetic interference and complete the compass calibration.Steps to calibrate the compass:Return to the home page → Click the "?” icon in the upper right corner of the compass to start compass calibration → Follow the instructions to complete the compass calibration;.Steps to calibrate the compass:\n- Due to your device hardware limitations, the compass does not work, you can try to use the map to determine the location.Steps to open the map: Back to homepage → Click the compass button to open the map → Open the location permission to use the map.

resources.string: Have problems encountered during use? Find solutions in FAQ.
Problem is not solved? Please feedback more details about the problem.
The flashlight needs camera permission to provide you with a flashlight service. The flashlight will not invade your privacy, please allow camera permission.
If you enjoy the flashlight please consider giving us a review.
The flashlight needs camera permission to provide you with a flashlight service. The flashlight will not invade your privacy, please allow camera permission
Want to see something new? Just update and find out! Thanks for using!
We have fixed some potential bugs! Immediate update is strongly recommended!
This app is experiencing some serious problem, you should update to continue or quit! Your history record will persist!\nSorry for the inconvenience. We are committed to make the best app for you!
